name: Booster Cars
description:
Made for the Wowie Jam 4.0 - Theme was "Cooperate with AI"

Basic kind of racing game where you race around a track with 4 other cars with the AI controlling your turns and movement while you control boosting and shooting little turtle shells at other cars.

Cars in the "ARCADE: FREE Racing Car" made by Mena asset pack on the Unity Asset Store. Everything else in the game was done by me.
